original_text: His wife took a lid and she put it over the top of the well. Then she put some grain on it. Nobody knew that the men were hiding there.
korean_text: 그 집 여인이 덮을 것을 가져다가 우물 아귀를 덮고 찧은 곡식을 그 위에 널매 전혀 알지 못하더라

sentences.original_text: and she put it over the top of the well
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그녀는 그것을 우물 위에 올려놓았다

sentences.original_text: Then she put some grain on it
sentences.korean_translation: 그러고 나서 그녀는 그 위에 곡식을 얹었다

sentences.original_text: that the men were hiding there
